Description
AbstractDAO<T>
Abstract Data Access to the Database
Bills
Bills is a mask of the database table bill
BillsBLL
BillsBLL Class represents the bill logic, using BillsDAO
BillsDAO
BillsDAO implements the logic of database table bill through ConnectionFactory
BillsInterface
User Interface to manage Bills, which is controlled by presentation.Control
Clients
Clients is a mask of the database table client
ClientsBLL
ClientsBLL Class represents the client logic, using ClientsDAO
ClientsDAO
ClientsDAO implements the logic of database table client through connectionFactory
ClientsInterface
User Interface to manage Clients, which is controlled by presentation.Control

OrdersDAO
OrdersDAO implements the logic of database table orders through ConnectionFactory
OrdersInterface
User Interface to manage Orders, which is controlled by presentation.Control

ProductsDAO

User Interface to manage Products, which is controlled by presentation.Control
